mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user ( usercode , username , password , salt , locked ) VALUES ( #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locked,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT id as "id" , usercode as "usercode" , username as "username" , password as "password" , salt as "salt" , locked as "locked" FROM sys_user WHERE id=#{id}
